department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Jeff Tudor graduated from Indiana University in 1998 with a degree in mass communication and political science.  Jeff worked in video production and local news before moving to Chicago to work for CNN.<br>While covering news across the country Jeff also freelanced for many production companies and news organizations.  Jeff has worked on various documentaries and programs for the History Channel, Discovery Channel, HGTV.<br>Currently Jeff Tudor is a producer for Big Shoulders in Chicago working on everything from independent feature films, music videos, commercial, corporate video, and live broadcast television.<br>
